name: PT. Eatiki
description: Operator of a restaurant review and booking platform intended to help people find restaurants in Indonesia. The company's platform offers user-generated reviews, ratings and photos along with recommendations and promo offers at any participating restaurant, enabling culinary connoisseurs and travelers to find interesting restaurants and events and make hassle-free reservations and earn dining points.
one_liner: Operator of a restaurant review and booking platform intended to help people find restaurants in Indonesia. The company's platform offers user-generated reviews, ratings and photos along with recommendations and promo offers at any participating restaurant, enabling culinary connoisseurs and travelers to find interesting restaurants and events and make hassle-free reservations and earn dining points.
